message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

Bob, I understand your desire to save money, but $850,000 is still a bit too low for me.  How about we split the difference and settle on $875,000?  This would still give you a good deal, and I would be able to make a profit closer to my desired price.  Let me know your thoughts!
I understand your point, Alice, but I'm still looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $825,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
